headline: A Prisoner Sent Lawmakers Lurid Accusations About His Brother, a State Senator
abstract: The State Senator in New York told his Democratic colleagues that the 13-page letter was unequivocally false.
lead_paragraph: ALBANY, N.Y. — Before the people’s business officially began last week, before New York State legislators gaveled in for the 2020 session, lawmakers were first forced to confront an unusual matter.
